flavorText: Mirri and Gerrard have been the best of friends since they trained together under the maro-sorcerer Multani. A fierce and agile warrior, she rejoined Gerrard aboard the *Weatherlight* as his unofficial first mate shortly after he assumed command of the flying ship.
name: Mirri
originalText: Each of your basic lands may be tapped to produce any color of mana instead of its normal type.
text: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
